title: Revert action button styling to Version 335

requirements.summary: Revert the action buttons in MessageBubble.tsx to their original styling from Version 335, restoring full visibility and all button styles (colors, opacity, background, borders, hover states) while preserving the Version 369 message header layout reorder
acceptanceCriteria: All action buttons in MessageBubble are fully visible and not hidden or transparent
Button colors, backgrounds, borders, and hover states match the Version 335 appearance
Action buttons remain functional (clickable) after the styling revert
No regression in the message layout reorder (Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar) introduced in Version 369

file_operations.description: Restore action button styling (pin, reply, reaction buttons) to Version 335 appearance. Specifically: ensure all buttons have explicit opacity: 1, visible backgrounds, proper text/icon colors, defined borders where applicable, and working hover states. Do not alter the message header layout order (Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar). Focus only on the action button styling within the message bubble component.
